title: 전치사+관계대명사 도치
description: 전치사+관계대명사 도치을 연습합니다. PREPOSITION-RELATIVE-INVERSION 패턴을 활용하여 고급 영어 표현을 익힙니다.
examples: The person to whom I spoke was helpful.
The project on which we are working is important.
The system on which he relies is outdated.
learning_points: relative-clause 관련 고급 표현과 실용적 활용

sentences.kr: 제가 대화한 그 사람이 도움이 되었습니다.
sentences.en: The person to whom I spoke was helpful.
The project on which we are working is important.
The system on which he relies is outdated.
The house in which they live is beautiful.
The topic about which we discussed was complex.
The field in which the company invests is technology.
The teacher from whom I learned was excellent.
The meeting in which they participated was successful.
